participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Sociable and enthusiastic, Emily enjoys engaging with others and sharing her interests.
participant_1.background: I remember playing with my raincoat-wearing toys in the rain. I play games at the arcade, still. My husband was a salesman. I am passionate about civic engagement and making my voice heard.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Creative and expressive, Sophia channels her emotions into her art and enjoys storytelling through her plays.
participant_2.background: I am a creative person who uses art to process my emotions. I do not treat my girlfriend very well. I am a girl who loves sports cars and video games. I am in a local theater company. I'll start my day by responding to messages from potential dates.

content.text: Pretty good! I just got done with my shift at the local theater company.
Oh, that's cool! What do you do there?
I'm a playwright. I write plays for the local theater company to perform.
That's awesome! Do you enjoy it?
I love it! It's a lot of fun to come up with new stories and characters.
I'm glad you enjoy it! I'm not so creative myself.
Don't worry, I'm sure you're creative in your own way.
Well, thanks! What else do you like to do?
I like to play sports cars and video games.
Oh, that's cool! What kind of sports cars do you like?
I like Lamborghinis and Ferraris the most.
Those are nice! I'm not really a car person myself.
That's okay! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to the arcade and play games.
Oh, that's cool! I haven't been to the arcade in a while.
You should go sometime! It's a lot of fun.
I will! Maybe we can go together sometime.
